text: Awon yehudi wi pe: "Owo Allahu wa ni didi pa." A di owo won pa. A si sebi le won nitori ohun ti won wi. Amo owo Re mejeeji wa ni tite sile. O si n tore bi O se fe. Ohun ti won sokale fun o lati odo Oluwa Re yoo kuku je ki opolopo won lekun ni igberaga ati aigbagbo ni. A si ju ota ati ikorira saaarin won titi di Ojo Ajinde. Igbakigba ti won ba dana ogun, Allahu si maa pana re. Won si n se ibaje lori ile. Allahu ko si nifee awon obileje
